context.p: You can view a list of all visits currently in progress from the Visit manager.
To view a list of all visits in progress:

step.cmd: On the Active Visit Summary panel, click the in progress hyperlink. A window is displayed, listing all visits in progress.

info.note: You can refresh the statistics in the Active Visit Summary panel by clicking the window name in the sidebar, or by pressing the f5 key on your keyboard.
